Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: Delete Memos Where Num = @Num

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Declare @cnt Int Select @cnt = Count(*) From Notes Where Id = @Id And Password = @Password
If @Cnt = 0 Begin Return 0 --번호와 암호가 맞는게 없으면 0을 반환 End
Declare @AnswerNum Int Declare @RefOrder Int Declare @Ref Int Declare @ParentNum Int
Select @AnswerNum = AnswerNum, @RefOrder = RefOrder, @Ref = Ref, @ParentNum = ParentNum From Notes Where Id = @Id
If @AnswerNum = 0 Begin if @RefOrder > 0 Begin UPDATE Notes SET RefOrder = RefOrder - 1 WHERE Ref = @Ref AND RefOrder > @RefOrder UPDATE Notes SET AnswerNum = AnswerNum - 1 WHERE Id = @ParentNum End Delete Notes WHERE Id= @Id Delete Notes WHERE ID= @ParentNum AND ModifyIp = N'((DELETED))' AND AnswerNum = 0 End Else Begin Update Notes Set Name = N'(Unknown)', Email='', Password='', Title = N'(삭제된 글입니다.)', Content = N'(삭제된 글입니다.' + N'현재 답변이 포함되어 있기 때문에 내용만 삭제되었습니다.)',ModifyIp = N'((DELETED))', FileName='', FileSize=0, CommentCount = 0 Where Id= @Id End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Delete Users Where UID =@UID

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: --[5] 삭제 저장 프로시저 Create Proc dbo.DeleteUsers @UID Int As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT Count(*) From Notes

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[GetCountNotes] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: Select Num, Name, Title,PostDate, PostIP From Memos Order By Num Desc

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: Create Proc dbo.ListMemo As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: With DotNetNoteOrderedLists As ( Select [Id], [Name], [Email], [Title], [PostDate], [ReadCount], [Ref], [Step], [RefOrder], [AnswerNum], [ParentNum], [CommentCount], [FileName], [FileSize], [DownCount], ROW_NUMBER() Over(Order By Ref Desc, RefOrder Asc) As 'RowNumber' From Notes ) Select * From DotNetNoteOrderedLists Where RowNumber Between @Page * 10 + 1 And (@page +1) *10

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Select [UID], [UserID], [Password] From Users Order By UID Desc;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: --[2] 출력 저장 프로시저 Create Proc dbo.ListUsers As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin Transaction Update Memos Set Name = @Name, Email = @Email, Title = @Title Where Num = @Num Commit Transaction

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Declare @cnt Int
Select @cnt = Count(*) From Notes Where Id = @Id And Password = @Password
If @cnt > 0 --번호와 암호가 맞는게 있다면... Begin Update Notes Set Name = @Name, Email = @Email, Title = @Title, ModifyIp = @ModifyIp, ModifyDate = GetDate(), Content = @Content, Encoding = @Encoding, Homepage = @Homepage, FileName = @FileName, FileSize = @FileSize Where Id = @Id
Select '1' End Else Select '0'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Begin Tran Update Users Set UserID = @UserID, [Password] = @Password Where UID = @UID Commit Tran

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
--[0] 변수 선언 Declare @MaxRefOrder Int Declare @MaxRefAnswerNum Int Declare @ParentRef Int Declare @ParentStep Int Declare @ParentRefOrder Int
--[1] 부모글의 답변 수 (AnswerNum)를 1증가 Update Notes Set AnswerNum = AnswerNum + 1 Where Id = @ParentNum
--[2] 같은 글에 대해서 답변을 두 번 이상하면 먼저 답변한 게 위에 나타나게 한다. Select @MaxRefOrder = RefOrder, @MaxRefAnswerNum = AnswerNum From Notes Where ParentNum = @ParentNum And RefOrder = (Select Max(RefOrder) From Notes Where ParentNum = @ParentNum)
If @MaxRefOrder Is Null Begin Select @MaxRefOrder = RefOrder From Notes Where Id = @ParentNum Set @MaxRefAnswerNum = 0 End
--[3] 중간에 답변달 때(비집고 들어갈 자리 마련) Select @Parentref = Ref, @ParentStep = Step From Notes Where Id = @ParentNum
Update Notes Set RefOrder = RefOrder + 1 Where Ref = @ParentRef And RefOrder > (@MaxRefOrder + @MAxRefAnswerNum)
--[4] 최종저장 Insert Notes(Name, Email, Title, PostIp, Content, Password, Encoding, Homepage, Ref, Step, RefOrder, ParentNum, FileName, FileSize) Values(@Name, @Email, @Title, @PostIp, @Content, @Password, @Encoding, @Homepage, @ParentRef, @ParentStep+1, @MaxRefOrder + @MaxRefAnswerNum + 1, @ParentNum, @FileName, @FileSize)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Declare @strSql NVarChar(150) -- 변수 선언 Set @strSql = 'Select Num, Name, Email, Title, PostDate, PostIP From Memos Where' +@SearchField+'like N"%' + @SearchQuery+'%" Order By Num Desc' --Print @strSql Exec (@strSql) --완성된 SQL문 실행

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Set @SearchQuery = '%' + @SearchQuery + '%'
Select Count(*) From Notes Where( Case @SearchField When 'Name' Then[Name] When 'Title' Then Title When 'Content' Then Content Else @SearchQuery End) Like @SearchQuery

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: With DotNetNoteOrderedLists As ( Select [Id], [Name], [Email], [Title], [PostDate], [ReadCount], [Ref], [Step], [RefOrder], [AnswerNum], [ParentNum], [CommentCount], [FileName], [FileSize], [DownCount], ROW_NUMBER() Over(Order By Ref Desc, RefOrder Asc) As 'RowNumber' From Notes Where ( Case @SearchField When 'Name' Then [Name] When 'Title' Then Title When 'Content' Then Content Else @SearchQuery End ) Like '%' + @SearchQuery + '%') Select [Id], [Name], [Email], [Title], [PostDate], [ReadCount], [Ref], [Step], [RefOrder], [AnswerNum], [ParentNum], [CommentCount], [FileName], [FileSize], [DownCount], [RowNumber] From DotNetNoteOrderedLists Where RowNumber Between @Page * 10 + 1 And (@page +1) *10 Order By Id Desc

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Declare @strSql NVarChar(255) --변수 선언 Set @strSql = ' Select * From Users Where ' + @SearchField + 'Like "%' + @SearchQuery + '% "' Exec(@strSql)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Select Num, Name, Email, Title, PostDate, PostIP From Memos Where Num = @Num

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
--조회수 카운트 1증가 Update Notes Set ReadCount = ReadCount + 1 Where Id = @Id
--모든 항목 조회 Select * From Notes Where Id = @Id

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Select [UID], [UserID], [Password] From Users Where UID = @UID

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: --[3] 상세 저장 프로시저 Create Proc dbo.ViewUsers @UID Int As

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: Insert Memos(Name, Email, Title, PostIP) Values(@Name, @Email, @Title, @PostIP)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
Declare @MaxRef Int Select @MaxRef = Max(Ref) From Notes
If @MaxRef is Null Set @MaxRef = 1 --테이블 생성 후 처음만 비교 Else Set @MaxRef = @MaxRef + 1
Insert Notes (Name, Email, Title, PostIp, Content, Password, Encoding, Homepage, Ref, FileName, FileSize) Values(@Name, @Email, @Title, @PostIp, @Content, @Password, @Encoding, @Homepage, @MaxRef, @FileName, @FileSize)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: Insert Into Users Values(@UserID, @Password)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
